name: Escape Velocity (JestemStefan, szrap)
description:
Hello everyone!

Me and SilverSock created this game in 10 days for Godot Wild Jam #8.

Theme of the jam was Black Hole. 

Our game is about saving your lowerback from destructive gravity of black hole.
Heating up boosters, dodging obstacles and collecting fuel is key to succes!

Good luck!
We are waiting for feedback!
